column4: What terminal command should I use for safely formatting an HDD ?
fdisk and mkfs.

Shred doesnt format. Shred shreds.
What about "dd" ?
No.
dd bs=16M if=/dev/zero of=/dev/yourharddisk
So whats the difference between cat as nibbler_ suggested, and dd ?
nibbler_, using cat command I get permission denied, even with sudo ?
cat is the slowest solution. And sudo doesnt pass that ">" pipe.
I should use dd ?
Yes.
Yes.
Thats why i wrote bs=16M
kill -1 on the PID of the dd process.
kill -1

Hang up - and continue.
